    • Method Detail

      • avgConvergenceTime

        public static <T> double avgConvergenceTime​(int n,
                                            Initialization<T> init,
                                            int iterations)
        Computes the average convergence time in parallel rounds.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of opinions handled by the agents.
        Parameters:
        n - The population size.
        init - A description of the initial configuration.
        iterations - The number of times over which the average should be computed.
        Returns:
        The average convergence time, in parallel rounds.

      • FollowTheTrend

        public static Initialization<java.lang.Integer> FollowTheTrend​(boolean randomOpinions)
        Return an Initialization of the "lazy follow the trend" dynamics with a unique source agent, and a sample size equal to 10 log n.
        Parameters:
        randomOpinions - If this is true, opinions will be drawn uniformly at random. Otherwise, they will be taken to be different from the correct opinion.
        Returns:
        An initialization of the "lazy follow the trend" dynamics.

      • Voter

        public static Initialization<java.lang.Integer> Voter​(boolean randomOpinions)
        Return an Initialization of the "Voter" dynamics with a unique source agent.
        Parameters:
        randomOpinions - If this is true, opinions will be drawn uniformly at random. Otherwise, they will be taken to be different from the correct opinion.
        Returns:
        An initialization of the "Voter" dynamics.

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
